title: Emerald and Ruby Vanki Pendant with South Sea Pearl - A Timeless Treasure
materials: VS Clarity). Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for an enhanced luster and durability.
features: This exquisite pendant draws inspiration from the traditional Vanki design, a symbol of auspiciousness. It features a central, emerald-cut natural emerald, complemented by a vibrant ruby at the top. Both gemstones are surrounded by multiple rows of sparkling natural diamonds in a pave setting, enhancing their brilliance. A lustrous South Sea pearl dangles gracefully at the bottom, adding a touch of elegance. The meticulous craftsmanship reflects the legacy of Hyderabadi jewelry making.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for elegant evening wear and modern celebrations.
description: This Vanki pendant is more than just jewelry; it's a statement piece steeped in South Indian tradition and cultural significance. The use of high-quality natural gemstones, the intricate diamond setting, and the exquisite South Sea pearl make it a true heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting brilliance. Own a piece of heritage that blends timeless elegance with contemporary style.
